subject: Football
Stadiums and Arenas
lead_paragraph: The Los Angeles City Council approved a framework deal that would grant a private developer access to tax-free financing to help it build a 72,000-seat N.F.L. stadium on the city’s convention center campus.
snippet: The Los Angeles City Council approved a framework deal that would grant a private developer access to tax-free financing to help it build a 72,000-seat N.F.L. stadium on the city’s convention center campus.
